product.title: Blue Elephant and Spotted Wave Blanket
product.body: Our kids love snuggling up with this lush comfy, cozy, and cuddly four layer 100% natural cotton muslin blanket. Soft breathable and versatile blanket is made of natural cotton fibers. Perfect for home or on the go.

product.title: Crinkle Bunny Ears Teether - Navy
product.body: This Bunny Ears teether ring is perfect for the simple + practical babe. Made with Cotton Jersey Knit fabric with a sensory crinkle paper between the fabrics. Toss it in the freezer to help soothe those sore gums or in the diaper bag for a lightweight (and cute) toy while out and about.

product.title: Black Striped Canvas Diaper Bag
product.body:
Our diaper bags feature durable canvas for extended outdoor use and stylish faux leather trim. With 5 outer pockets and 5 inner pockets, you'll have more storage than you'll ever need. Two of the inner pockets are insulated for storing bottles. There is a zipper pocket on the inside and outside of the bag.

This bag also comes with a water-resistant changing pad and two stroller straps for added convenience. 

Measurements: 11.5 inches wide x 13 inches tall x 5 inches deep

product.title: Charcoal Hoodie
product.body: 100% cotton soft french terry charcoal hoodie with white and charcoal striped rib knit cuffs. The perfect cozy item for any trendy tot.

product.title: Blue Deer Snap Bibs Set of 3
product.body: Soft and comfortable 100% natural cotton muslin. These stylish and easy to care for bib features multiple snaps for a perfect fit. The extra absorbent fabric makes these bibs a must have for feeding and teething.

product.title: Classic Canvas Diaper Bag PRESALE - Black & White Striped
product.body:
PRESALE ITEM - ESTIMATED SHIP DATE September 1st

Our Classic Canvas Diaper Bag features durable canvas for extended outdoor use and an inner layer of waterproof eco PUL (same material used in cloth diaper covers). It's 100% machine washable and dryable! It has a cross body strap, outer zipper pocket, four open outer pockets, an inner pacifier pocket, two deep diaper pockets, two open pockets, and two bottle/cup pockets. 

This bag fits perfectly in our vegan or genuine leather diaper backpack/tote (sold separately)

Measurements

11.5 inches wide x 13 inches tall x 5 inches deep
